additional_data.description: The god of the Underworld in Greek mythology. The little brother of Poseidon and Zeus, he's just as powerful as his siblings, if not more so. Most people assume he's evil since he's the king of the Underworld, and while this is certainly reflected in his appearance and abilities, he's actually extremely kind. And the Underworld is in fact much more peaceful than you might expect. He puts everything he's got into making sure that people have a good first impression when they arrive.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 01/07/2017 ~ 31/08/2017
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "Don't worry, the Underworld isn't actually all that bad."
limit_break: "This reminds me of the good old days..."
